general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the motif including cartoon, motif ID, name and synonyms.
general.title: General

glycans.text: The Glycans With This Motif section provides a list of glycans in which the motif is present.
glycans.title: Glycans With This Motif

publications.text: The Publications section contains publications where the given motif was reported.
publications.title: Publications
